name: _ScanFound
description: Successful scan with recognized Product or Thng

name: _ScanNotRecognized
description: Failed to recognize image (high confidence not the right general characteristics e.g. a cat when expecting a can), bar code, characters, PIN code didn’t match pattern

name: _ScanNotFound
description: Recognized the image as correct type, bar code, characters, PIN code but couldn’t find a Product or a Thng

name: _DuplicateSeen
description: The scan matched as a duplicate

name: _OfferUsed
description: Offer has been used by consumer and can be used again

name: _OfferConsumed
description: Offer has been consumed and can no longer be used

name: _UserAuthenticated
description: User authenticated from anonymous user to known user

name: _Registered
description: Item has been registered to a consumer/user
